name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Civil Engineer with extensive experience in regulatory compliance, project management, and agile methodologies. Proficient in utilizing data-driven decision-making strategies to enhance sewer inspection processes and ensure high-quality outcomes. Skilled in defect coding and developing AI models to streamline engineering operations. Additionally, brings over 10 years of backend development expertise, with a strong focus on designing and delivering robust systems that meet regulatory standards. Previously contributed to significant projects at leading organizations, leveraging a diverse tech stack including **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **AWS**, **Azure**, and advanced AI/ML technologies.
